title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: AVAX Falls 2.1% as Nearly All Assets Trade Lower
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Bitcoin Cash (BCH) joined Avalanche (AVAX) as a top underperformer, also declining 2.1%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2428.16, down 1.0% (-25.41) since 4 p.m. ET on Tuesday.

One of 20 assets is trading higher.

Leaders: AAVE (+0.2%) and BTC (-0.1%).

Laggards: AVAX (-2.1%) and BCH (-2.1%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The news reports that nearly all assets in the CoinDesk 20 Index are trading lower, with the overall index down 1.0% and only one asset trading higher.
